fields.name: AddressPrefix
fields.description: The destination CIDR to which the route applies.

fields.name: HasBgpOverride
fields.description: A value indicating whether this route overrides overlapping BGP routes regardless of LPM.

fields.name: NextHopIPAddress
fields.description: The IP address packets should be forwarded to. Next hop values are only allowed in routes where the next hop type is VirtualAppliance.

fields.name: NextHopType
fields.description: The type of Azure hop the packet should be sent to.
